page.title: 19Where can we play?
page.content: Don't do this don't do that is all we see and hear, signs all over the place. We wrote about our play areas like this. Coronation Park has adventure things to go on.I like the swing it goes high. A,B,C, park has climbing frames in the shapes of letters.I like the A best because you can climb over it.I don't like the C it is dangerous.I play in the field because there is no playground near me. I have fun at the mushroom but there is a man and a woman called Mr and Mrs Grumpy they keep telling us off if we shout.As soon as I sat on a lady's fence I got told off.I was playing football Mr Grumpy said stop.We played in the cornfield and a man shouted at us.
